name: Asher LeRoy
subtitle: Cybersecurity Innovator | Founder | Embedded Systems & Audio Engineer
summary: Self-taught cybersecurity innovator and embedded systems engineer with a decade of experience, founding DeMoD LLC by age 21 to deliver mission-critical solutions in real-time audio, cybersecurity, and hardware. Architected a Rust-based real-time kernel and patented protocols for defense-grade applications, alongside eco-smart guitar platforms with sub-1ms DSP latency, ideal for startups, ITAR contractors, and high-ambition ventures.

experience.title: Founder & Lead Developer
bullets: Bootstrapped DeMoD LLC, prototyping scalable cybersecurity, real-time audio, and hardware solutions for defense and high-tech applications.
Developed demod.ltd on a VPS with Docker in 12 days, using Cloudflare, achieving PageSpeed Insights scores (Mar 31, 2025): Performance 94, Accessibility 89, Best Practices 100, SEO 82.

Designed the ITAR-regulated DeMoD Secure Protocol (DSP) with AES-256-GCM encryption, securing provisional patent (63/825,459) and submitting for USAF SBIR grant (AF254-D0814, Jun 2025); released sanitized DCF under GPLv3 for community adoption.

Created ArchibaldOS, a NixOS Linux distro with CachyOS' real-time BORE kernel, reducing audio latency by 30% (<1ms) using MusinX, NixOS, and TI DSP for real-time audio FX, rivaling Apple's Core Audio.

experience.title: Low Voltage Technician
bullets: Performed routine installation and maintenance of network cabling and security systems, ensuring operational reliability.
Gained hands-on experience with CAT5 cabling and hardware integration, applying skills to self-directed DeMoD LLC projects.

experience.title: Kitchen Support Specialist
bullets: Supported kitchen operations, including prep and inventory management, in a fast-paced environment.
Developed discipline and time management skills, contributing to efficiency in self-directed technical projects.

projects.title: PetaByte Madness
projects.subtitle: Solo Developer
bullets: Developing a C++ simulation game using idTech 4 engine fork, with 33% of profits supporting AMBER Alert via CAF. Integrates DCF netcode and EchoForge-DSP for sub-1ms audio.

projects.title: EchoForge-DSP & Guitar Platform
projects.subtitle: Solo Developer
bullets: Designed EchoForge-DSP, the most poweerful FOSH custom PCB with TI DSP, ADC, DAC, and USB-C for sub-1ms audio FX, integrated with Rust-based real-time kernel for guitars, drones, and space tech. Supports 32-bit/192kHz recording; uses Python for schematic/PCB generation. On GitHub under a strongly reciporical license.
Designed Big Bertha, a 5-string bass with hempcrete/metal body, vacuum tubes, and Jetson Nano for onboard DSP, achieving 24-bit/96kHz FX with Sierpinski fractal antenna for optimized BT/Wi-Fi.

projects.title: Other Projects
projects.subtitle: Solo Developer
bullets: Developed DeMoD-RISC-Audio-Kernel, a bare-metal Rust kernel for RISC-V, with drivers for USB, I2S, BT, and Wi-Fi, integrated with StreamDB for low-latency audio storage.
Built a 6ft emulation arcade machine (2020â€“2021) and a Geezer Butler-inspired Fender PJ Bass, demonstrating hardware craftsmanship.

skills.skills: AES-256-GCM, ITAR Compliance, Threat Mitigation, Network Security, Pen Testing
Rust, C++, Python, Docker, Nix, Full-Stack (HTML/CSS/JS, Node.js), Linux Kernel Optimization, AI-Enhanced Prototyping
PCB Design, RISC-V, Drone Engineering, Audio DSP, Low-Latency Kernel Tuning, Sierpinski Antenna Design

achievements: Secured provisional patent for DSP (63/825,459) and submitted USAF SBIR grant.
Optimized ArchibaldOS to achieve <1ms audio latency with Rust kernel and TI DSP PCB.
Designed eco-smart guitar platform with hempcrete body and Sierpinski antenna for 90% efficient BT/Wi-Fi.
